column5:
Danke für den tollen Beitrag! Ich gebe dir vollkommen recht. 
Besonders das mit der Begrenzung der Kinder-Krankheitstage. Ich selbst habe keine Kinder, aber finde es verrückt, dass man die Anzahl solcher Tage begrenzt. Wenn ein Kind krank ist, dann sollte das Kind bestmöglich versorgt sein und dazu zählt für mich auch, dass Eltern mit dem Kind zum Arzt gehen, ihm eine Suppe machen, die Medikamenteneinnahme kontrollieren etc.
Es ist nicht fair nach Verbrauch der erlaubten Krankheitstage den Arbeitnehmer zu verpflichten Urlaubstage zu nutzen. An einem Urlaubstag soll sich ein Arbeitnehmer erholen und nicht drei Stunden in einem Kinderarzt-Wartezimmer verbringen.
Einfach nur unnötig. Und wegen so einem ... gibt es Deutsche, die wieder die Rassismus-Schiene fahren werden. Wie kann man nur so blöd und unverantwortlich sein.

"And when you die, the only kingdom you'll see
is 2 foot wide and 6 foot deep" - House of Wolves (by  Bring Me the Horizon)

Thank for the effort of putting a long text together. Your advices are really good. At the moment the dog shelter idea isn't probably not possible, because here in Germany we have a Lockdown. But I will keep this idea in mind.

The idea with the professor is maybe worth a thought. But the problem is that my examinations are mandatory and I have to get sick leave to be freed of that. But maybe it's a root to go. I don't know.

It's nice to read about your happy ending with your graduation and I'm truly glad for you that you made it. That's the kind of stories that give me hope.

Thanks for answer!

Das ist der größte Bullshit, den es gibt. Das sind dann immer so Google-Übersetzer Titel. Und ich meine... Youtube kennt ja meinen YouTube-Verlauf. Ich habe auch fast nur englische YouTuber abonniert. Warum zum Fick sollte ich dann simple Videotitel nicht verstehen können?
Not really. I mean, I've read so much. I've done so much. Sometimes you have to write your feelings down and I wanted to share it.
Thanks for sharing this post. It shows us that there is always a reason to fight. We can do it!

To be attractive for women you need to love yourself first. I'm sure you not ugly and if you are overweight and you have a problem with it, then you should tackle that.
Try little steps. Begin with like walking, then try jogging, change your eating style. Do as little steps as you like. And don't do it for the girls. Do it for yourself.

My dad died shortly after my 20th birthday. 
What should I say to you? Do you believe in god?
I don't but I'm not willing to accept that there is nothing after life. Humans have characters, souls and personality. We are not just a sack of blood and bones. 
And that's why I think there will be something after our lifes on earth. 
Maybe your dad really is in a better place now. 
He will be part of your heart for the rest of your life. 
I'm so sorry for your loss and I hope you will make your way. And seriously: Look for help, if you need help! There is no problem in it. Everybody will help you for sure.

All the best. ❤️

How much did your x200s cost?
Here in Germany I paid 130€ for my x230 with Docking Station.
What a lovely looking machine. For 10€ it's a steal and I like that it gets Lubuntu-love, perfect for thesd old machines.
